Menu.name: Sushi Cone
Menu.ingredients: Soya wrapper, Sushi rice, Sriracha aioli, Tobiko, Pickled ginger, Cucumber, Tempura prawn, Avocado, Wasabi, Sesame seeds, Daikon sprouts
Menu.description: Beautiful hand rolled sushi cones filled with tempura prawns, fresh avocado, crunchy cucumber, tobiko, pickled ginger and a drizzle of sriracha aioli.

Menu.name: Japanese Gyoza
Menu.ingredients: Pork gyoza, Garlic Chili, Sauce Hot, mustard, Green onion, Sesame seeds
Menu.description: Pan-fired, steamed pork gyoza served on a bed of sesame soy dipping sauce and garnished with a flavourful blend of spicy mustard and vibrant green onion.

Menu.name: Nachos Grande
Menu.ingredients: Tortilla chips, Cheddar/ Monterey Jack cheese, Refried black beans, Pulled chicken, Avocado/salsa, Pickled jalapenos Green onion/cilantro, Sliced black olives, Sour cream/yogurt mix
Menu.description: Layered Nachos made as spicy or as mild as you like them

Menu.name: Korean Fried Cauliflower
Menu.ingredients: Cauliflower, Tempura batter, Korean chili paste, Sweet chili sauce, Green onion, Lime wedge, Cilantro, Sesame seeds
Menu.description: The Asian flavours in this dish are unique and exciting. Our product development chefs first experienced Korean miso in a Japanese restaurant with spicy tofu and very quickly fell in love with the silky miso and spicy chili. This condiment is excellent in its mild form and perfect to serve with cauliflower.

Menu.name: Mushroom Soup
Menu.description: Wild mushrooms, fresh cream and a hint of sherry toped with fresh parsley.

Menu.name: Yellowfin Tuna Salad
Menu.ingredients: Ahi Tuna, Greens mix, Napa cabbage, Mini cucumber, Carrot, Green onions, Crispy noodles, Mango, Mint leaves, Cilantro, Chili lime dressing mint, Amorosa tomato, Peanuts, Avocado, Cilantro emulsion, Cilantro oil
Menu.description: Seared rare Yellow in Ahi Tuna served in a light cilantro emulsion next to an Asian inspired salad tower.

Menu.name: House Salad Starter
Menu.ingredients: Greens mix, French vinaigrette, Pickled currants,Toasted almonds, Feta cheese, Carrots, Watermelon, radish, Lemon juice
Menu.description: Mixed greens and fresh market vegetables in a French vinaigrette withcrumbled feta and pickled currants. Finished with freshly squeezed lemon juice.

Menu.name: Baja Fish Tacos
Menu.ingredients: Basa, Shrimp, Onion, Corn tortillas, Cheddar cheese, Leaf, lettuce, Green goddess sauce, Guacamole, Tomatoes, Cilantro sprig
Menu.description: Fish, Shrimp, and house made guacamole in hand pressed corn tortillas. Served with an authentic Mexican hot sauce.
